00015 CHUD::CHUD(unsigned long &score, signed char &lives, unsigned int &charges) :
00016 m_score(score),
00017 m_lives(lives),
00018 m_charges(charges),
00019 mp_Background(NULL)
00020 {
00021  m_Rect.x = 4;
00022  m_Rect.y = 2;
00023  m_Rect.w = 80;
00024  m_Rect.h = 29;
00025  CreateBackground();
00026 }
00027 
00028 std::string getRightAligned(std::string text, size_t size)
00029 {
00030  if(text.size() > size)
00031   return text;
00032 
00033  std::string output;
00034  for(size_t i=0 ; i<(size-text.size()) ; i++)
00035   output += ' ';
00036  output += text;
00037  return output;
00038 }
00039 
00040 /**
00041  * \brief This function prepares the Background, so in process it can be rendered.
00042  * This function should only be called once!
00043  */
00044 void CHUD::CreateBackground()
00045 {
00046  // Create a surface for that
00047  SDL_Surface *temp;
00048  const Uint32 flags = 0;
00049  // For some reason the Alpha mask doesn't work, if blitsurface == screensurface. Not sure if every system is affected of that.
00050  // Maybe I write a function for the proper masks...
00051  #if SDL_BYTEORDER == SDL_BIG_ENDIAN
00052   const Uint32 rmask = 0xFF000000;
00053   const Uint32 gmask = 0x00FF0000;
00054   const Uint32 bmask = 0x0000FF00;
00055      const Uint32 amask = 0x000000FF;
00056     #else
00057      const Uint32 rmask = 0x000000FF;
00058      const Uint32 gmask = 0x0000FF00;
00059      const Uint32 bmask = 0x00FF0000;
00060      const Uint32 amask = 0xFF000000;
00061     #endif
00062 
00063  mp_Background = SDL_CreateRGBSurface( flags, m_Rect.w, m_Rect.h, 32, rmask, gmask, bmask, amask);
00064 
00065  SDL_Rect headsrcrect, headdstrect;
00066  headsrcrect.x = 0;
00067  headsrcrect.y = 0;
00068  headdstrect.w = headsrcrect.w = 16;
00069  headdstrect.h = headsrcrect.h = 16;
00070  headdstrect.x = m_Rect.x;
00071  headdstrect.y = m_Rect.y+11;
00072 
00073  CSprite &KeenHeadSprite = g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(PMAPDOWNFRAME);
00074  temp = SDL_ConvertSurface( KeenHeadSprite.getSDLSurface(), mp_Background->format, flags );
00075  BlitSurfaceMerge( temp, &headsrcrect, mp_Background, &headdstrect );
00076  SDL_FreeSurface(temp);
00077 
00078  int sprite=0;
00079  size_t Episode = g_pBehaviorEngine->getEpisode();
00080  if(Episode == 1) sprite = OBJ_RAY_DEFSPRITE_EP1;
00081  else if(Episode == 2) sprite = OBJ_RAY_DEFSPRITE_EP2;
00082  else if(Episode == 3) sprite = OBJ_RAY_DEFSPRITE_EP3;
00083 
00084  // Draw the shot
00085  CSprite &KeenGunSprite = g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(sprite);
00086  headdstrect.w = headsrcrect.w = KeenGunSprite.getWidth();
00087  headdstrect.h = headsrcrect.h = KeenGunSprite.getHeight();
00088  headdstrect.x = m_Rect.x+45-(headsrcrect.w/2);
00089  headdstrect.y = m_Rect.y+19-(headsrcrect.h/2);
00090 
00091  temp = SDL_ConvertSurface( KeenGunSprite.getSDLSurface(), mp_Background->format, flags );
00092  BlitSurfaceMerge( temp, &headsrcrect, mp_Background, &headdstrect );
00093  SDL_FreeSurface(temp);
00094 
00095 
00096  temp = SDL_DisplayFormatAlpha(mp_Background);
00097  SDL_FreeSurface(mp_Background);
00098  mp_Background = temp;
00099 
00100  // Draw the rounded borders
00101  DrawCircle(0, 0, 80);
00102  DrawCircle(17, 15, 22);
00103  DrawCircle(58, 15, 22);
00104 }
00105 
00106 void CHUD::DrawCircle(int x, int y, int width)
00107 {
00108  SDL_Rect text, outline;
00109 
00110  Uint8 r,g,b;
00111  CFont &Font = g_pGfxEngine->getFont(0);
00112  //Uint32 bgcolor = Font.getBGColour(false);
00113  Font.getBGColour(false, &r, &g, &b);
00114  //SDL_GetRGB(bgcolor, mp_Background->format, &r, &g, &b);
00115 
00116  outline.x = x+4;
00117  outline.y = y;
00118  outline.w = width-8;
00119  outline.h = 12;
00120  SDL_FillRect(mp_Background, &outline, SDL_MapRGBA(mp_Background->format, 0,0,0,255)); // Black
00121  outline.x = x+2;
00122  outline.y = y+1;
00123  outline.w = width-4;
00124  outline.h = 10;
00125  SDL_FillRect(mp_Background, &outline, SDL_MapRGBA(mp_Background->format, 0,0,0,255)); // Black
00126  outline.x = x+1;
00127  outline.y = y+2;
00128  outline.w = width-2;
00129  outline.h = 8;
00130  SDL_FillRect(mp_Background, &outline, SDL_MapRGBA(mp_Background->format, 0,0,0,255)); // Black
00131  outline.x = x;
00132  outline.y = y+4;
00133  outline.w = width;
00134  outline.h = 4;
00135  SDL_FillRect(mp_Background, &outline, SDL_MapRGBA(mp_Background->format, 0,0,0,255)); // Black
00136  text.x = x+4;
00137  text.y = y+1;
00138  text.w = width-8;
00139  text.h = 10;
00140  SDL_FillRect(mp_Background, &text, SDL_MapRGBA(mp_Background->format, r,g,b,255)); // Background colour
00141  text.x = x+2;
00142  text.y = y+2;
00143  text.w = width-4;
00144  text.h = 8;
00145  SDL_FillRect(mp_Background, &text, SDL_MapRGBA(mp_Background->format, r,g,b,255)); // Background colour
00146  text.x = x+1;
00147  text.y = y+4;
00148  text.w = width-2;
00149  text.h = 4;
00150  SDL_FillRect(mp_Background, &text, SDL_MapRGBA(mp_Background->format, r,g,b,255)); // Background colour
00151 }
00152 
00153 /**
00154  * \brief This part of the code will render the entire HUD
00155  */
00156 void CHUD::render()
00157 {
00158  // Compute the score that really will be seen
00159  int score, lives, charges;
00160  score = (m_score<999999999) ? m_score : 999999999;
00161  lives = (m_lives<99) ? m_lives : 99;
00162  charges = (m_charges<99) ? m_charges : 99;
00163 
00164  SDL_Surface *blitsurface = g_pVideoDriver->getBlitSurface();
00165 
00166  // Draw the background
00167  SDL_BlitSurface( mp_Background, NULL, blitsurface, &m_Rect);
00168  
00169  CFont &Font = g_pGfxEngine->getFont(0);
00170  Font.setFGColour(blitsurface->format, 0x000000);
00171  // Draw the score
00172  Font.drawFont(blitsurface, getRightAligned(itoa(score),9), 5+m_Rect.x, 2+m_Rect.y);
00173 
00174  // Draw the lives
00175  Font.drawFont(blitsurface, getRightAligned(itoa(lives),2), 21+m_Rect.x, 17+m_Rect.y);
00176 
00177  // Draw the charges
00178  Font.drawFont(blitsurface, getRightAligned(itoa(charges),2), 62+m_Rect.x, 17+m_Rect.y);
00179 
00180  Font.setFGColour(blitsurface->format, 0x0);
00181 }
00182 
00183 
00184 CHUD::~CHUD() {
00185  if(mp_Background) SDL_FreeSurface(mp_Background);
00186 }
